promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a young legendary horse grass-type pokemon wearing leafy bracers. It can be found in jungle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or horse. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Leafstallion, a a young legendary horse grass-type pokemon. It can be found in jungle-like environments It has the following abilities: Dragon Laser. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "horse", "grass" or "Leafstallion". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, horse-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, emerald galaxy background
generatedDescription: This youthful legend, cloaked in lush verdancy, gallops through dense rainforests. Talented in Dragon Laser, it wards off foes with grace.
